description: if we use neutron as network component， the operation for showing a server with the os-virtual-interfaces will fail, which is caused by the unrealized get_vifs_by_instance from nova/network/neutronv2/api.py.
title: fails when show  a server with os-virtual-interfaces

comments.content: if we use neutron as network component， the operation for showing a server with the os-virtual-interfaces will fail, which is caused by the unrealized get_vifs_by_instance from nova/network/neutronv2/api.py.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zhangchunlong1

comments.content: Do you have any more detail on this issue? How to reproduce it? what version of nova? the nova and neutron config etc.

comments.content: 90 days, no follow up on question
